Share.d:
Robo and spam callers overwhelming you? Still want to have the option to accept numbers not in your phone's contacts, without your phone ringing?
"Quiet Non-Contact Callers" silences these problem callers. Calls from phone numbers that are not in your phone's contacts are silenced. You still have the option to answer them, but you will not be distracted by your phone's ringtone.
Your phone will quietly notify you when an incoming call is silenced. All silenced calls will be added to a text log.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%cs_capabilities Capabilities </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%cs_name Contact Name </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%cs_incoming Incoming true if the phone call is incoming, false if you were the one initiating the call</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%cs_number Phone Number </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%cs_properties Properties </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4></StringArray>

TextElement.Str:
First, ensure that the application is given all requested permissions. For "Draw Over Apps", you must scroll down and select "Quiet Unknown Callers". For "Call Screening", you must select "Quiet Unknown Callers" as the default.
Next, expand your notification settings and "Turn off" the following notifications: 1. Placeholder 2. Monitor 3. Monitor (No active profiles)
Finally, launch the app. Press "stop reminding" or "disable" when prompted on remaining notifications.

Action.label: Request Permissions

Please provide requested permissions so that the app can work properly. No data is stored on the cloud. All data remains on your device.

Action.label: Call Silenced Notification
Action.Str: A call from %cs_number was silenced because it is not in your phone's contacts. Total calls silenced: %CallsSilenced.
Starts the application automatically when device boots up.
Resets number of calls silenced, call log (csv), variables, and reinitializes set up on next launch.
